001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.utilities.reflections.ReflectionUtil;
004import java.lang.reflect.Method;
005import org.aeonbits.owner.Converter;
006
007import static io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config.DbConfigHolder.getDbConfig;
008
009/**
010 * OWNER converter for {@link DbType}.  Uses the singleton {@link DbConfig}
011 * loaded by {@link DbConfigHolder#getDbConfig()} to discover via
012 * {@link ReflectionUtil} exactly one enum implementing {@link DbType}
013 * in your project package, then converts the raw property string into
014 * that enum constant.
015 *
016 * <p>If zero or more than one {@code enum} implementing {@link DbType}
017 * is found, this converter will fail fast with an {@link IllegalStateException}.</p>
018 *
019 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
020 */
021public class DbTypeConverter implements Converter<DbType<?>> {
022
023   /**
024    * Convert a {@code String} property into a {@link DbType} enum instance.
025    *
026    * @param method the {@link Method} annotated with the {@code @Key} for which this conversion applies
027    * @param input  the raw String value from configuration (e.g. "POSTGRES")
028    * @return the matching {@link DbType} enum constant
029    */
030   @Override
031   public DbType<?> convert(Method method, String input) {
032      try {
033         return ReflectionUtil.findEnumImplementationsOfInterface(DbType.class, input, getDbConfig().projectPackages());
034      } catch (Exception e) {
035         if (e.getMessage().contains("more than one enum")) {
036            return ReflectionUtil.findEnumImplementationsOfInterface(DbType.class, input,
037               getDbConfig().projectPackages()[0]);
038         } else {
039            throw e;
040         }
041      }
042   }
043}
